INSERT INTO t_fault (asset_id,fault_description,fault_time,vender_id,maintenance_time,maintenance_detail,cost,fault_state,operator,operator_date) VALUES (#{assetId},#{faultDescription},#{faultTime},#{venderId},#{maintenanceTime},#{maintenanceDetail},#{cost},#{faultState},#{operator},#{operatorDate})
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
mapper.select: select t.fault_id faultId , t.asset_id assetId , t.fault_description faultDescription , t.fault_time faultTime , t.vender_id venderId , t.maintenance_time maintenanceTime , t.maintenance_detail maintenanceDetail , t.cost cost , t.fault_state faultState , t.operator operator , t.operator_date operatorDate from t_fault t where t.fault_id = #{value}
